events.name: Athens Green Hackathon
events.about:
Greenhackathon is a series of events where developers get together to create and implement new ideas for a more sustainable future.

Working towards a more sustainable and resilient world is one of the biggest challenges that we face. We believe in a hacker approach to sustainability. Participating, getting excited and building things, being creative. Computer technology is both part of the problem and part of the solution, it all depends on how we use it. Let’s get together and use it for good.

Athens is hosting the Green Hackathon on the 14th, 15th and 16th of December. Registration is required to attend the two first days of the event. Entrance for the Sunday plenary is free to everyone that is interested but also requires a registration (see above). 

Latest hacks: 
Company Carbon Death Map
Energy Efficiency in Buildings
Greensta

more can be found here...

events.name: WOWZAPP 2012: Worldwide Hackathon for Windows -- Athens, Greece
events.about:
Be part of the app revolution!

By registering, you’ll be joining thousands of developers worldwide as we build apps for the next generation of Windows.

Expert Help, Free Resources

Microsoft app experts, developers and trainers will be available on-site to assist your learning and coding. Learn about building Windows Store apps today – download the info, tools and resources you need now. 

Windows Azure Mobile Services

Does your Store app idea include cloud services or storage? Check out Get started with Mobile Services –registered student WOWZAPP 2012 participants are eligible for a FREE student Windows Azure six-month subscription! – supplies are limited so be sure to register now!

events.name: Making Javascript Beautiful
events.about:
Το Flash πέθανε! Ζήτω το Flash! Αυτό είναι το ένα καλό που έκανε η Apple στον κόσμο.
Και τώρα τι; Πώς φτιάχνουμε τα ωραία γραφικά που γνωρίζουμε κι αγαπάμε;

Η VisionMobile και η Rulemotion σας προσκαλούν στο “Making Javascript Beautiful”, ένα Hackathon με θέμα τη δημιουργία εντυπωσιακών interactive γραφικών με τεχνολογίες HTML5 / Canvas / Javascript. Δώδεκα (12) ώρες με κώδικα, pizza και energy drink, με έπαθλο τη πτήση της ζωής σας.

Πως λειτουργεί το Hackathon;

Οι συμμετέχοντες χωρίζονται σε ολιγομελείς, κατά το δυνατόν ομοιογενείς, ομάδες. Εντός 12 ωρών καλούνται να δημιουργήσουν μια εφαρμογή γραφικών σε HTML5 / Canvas / Javascript χρησιμοποιώντας προεπιλεγμένα dataset δεδομένων.

Στο τέλος της ημέρας βραβεύεται η ομάδα που δημιούργησε την καλύτερη εφαρμογή, με βάση τα παρακάτω κριτήρια:

  1. Form, i.e. beautiful
  2. Function, i.e. conveys the information
  3. Comprehensible, i.e. does not need a manual

Σε ποιούς απευθύνεται;

Web developers, Javascript ninjas, Graphic Designers.

Τι χρειάζεται να φέρω μαζί μου;

Laptop, ιδέες, φαντασία και ενθουσιασμό για να δημιουργήσουμε όλοι μαζί.

Κόστος

Δωρεάν.

Έπαθλο

Τα μέλη της νικήτριας ομάδας θα πετάξουν με αλεξίπτωτο πλαγιάς (παραπέντε).

events.name: Startup Weekend Athens, Ohio
events.about: Startup Weekends are 54-hour events designed to provide superior experiential education for technical and non-technical entrepreneurs.  Beginning with Friday night pitches and continuing through brainstorming, business plan development, and basic prototype creation, Startup Weekends culminate in Sunday night demos and presentations.  Participants create working startups during the event and are able to collaborate with like-minded individuals outside of their daily networks. All teams hear talks by industry leaders and receive valuable feedback from local entrepreneurials. The weekend is centered around action, innovation, and education.  Whether you are looking for feedback on a idea, a co-founder, specific skill sets, or a team to help you execute, Startup Weekends are the perfect environment in which to test your idea and take the first steps towards launching your own.
